means: （印度教）梵天，宇宙最高的永恒的实体或精神

sentence.Network_en: The three main god figures are Brahma the creator, Vishnu the preserver and Siva the destroyer.
sentence.Network_cn: 三个主要的神是创造之神梵天 、 守护之神毗湿奴和破坏之神湿婆.

sentence.Network_en: Mara urged the former course, but the Buddha chose the latter, on the advice of Brahma.
sentence.Network_cn: 摩拉力劝他选择前一条路, 但是佛祖听从了众生之本梵天的劝告,选择了后者.

sentence.Network_en: Death Alone Can Free Them From Servitude, Said Para - Brahma.
sentence.Network_cn: 帕拉 — 梵天说,只有死亡才可以把他们从奴仆中得到解脱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 阿毗达摩第三十九讲... ... Vàsava。 又由于沙咖天帝，他娶了一个阿苏罗王韦巴吉帝 Mahàbrahma。 梵众天，这里的众是.
no god , no brahma can be found ., 没有上帝 , 没有梵可以找到.

the god king brahma , king mara ., 梵天王魔王.

means.word_mean: 1. the Creator; one of the three major deities in the later Hindu pantheon

2. any of several breeds of Indian cattle; especially a large American heat and tick resistant grayish humped breed evolved in the Gulf States by interbreeding Indian cattle and now used chiefly for crossbreeding

auth_sentence.content: Brahma remained in the lotus flower, floating and tossing on the sea.
